Heavy Industry & Processing

Hearing Screening for Industrial Plants & Processing Facilities

Large-Scale Hearing Surveillance for Heavy Industry

Contact Us Today

Industrial plants and processing facilities operate with continuous high-decibel machinery, making hearing surveillance essential for long-term employee health and legal compliance.

We deliver structured on-site hearing screening programmes suitable for large teams and complex operations.

Why Hearing Screening Is Critical in Industrial Plants

Irreversible Damage Risk

Continuous noise increases irreversible hearing damage risk

Magnified Exposure

Long shifts magnify exposure levels

Large-Scale Compliance

Supports large-scale compliance and reporting

Reduced Liability

Reduces employer liability and future claims

What Our Industrial Hearing Programme Includes

Pre-Screening Noise Exposure Assessment

Comprehensive workplace noise evaluation

Ear Health Inspection

Professional otoscopic examination

Audiometric Hearing Tests

Full hearing assessments for all employees

Detailed Compliance Reports

Comprehensive documentation for regulatory needs

Ongoing Monitoring Support

Continued surveillance programme management

Industrial Plants & Processing Facilities Hearing Screening – FAQs

We provide structured hearing screening programmes suitable for large teams and multi-shift industrial operations.
